fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make a hit list of three people at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will deal a Basic Attack to everyone on your hit list at the end of the night that you make it.
- If any of your targets would survive your attack, your ability will fail, and you will commit suicide out of shame.
- You may not make a hit list on Night 1.
- You lose your Basic Defense once you have won.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully kill three players in one night.
